thread.title: Julianne Hough Sways Hips in Hot Pink Leggings for Spirited Workout | The Nerd Stash
thread.title_full: Julianne Hough Sways Hips in Hot Pink Leggings for Spirited Workout | The Nerd Stash

author: Amanda Lynne
title: Julianne Hough Sways Hips in Hot Pink Leggings for Spirited Workout | The Nerd Stash
text: [Julianne Hough](https://thenerdstash.com/tag/julianne-hough) is starting 2024 on a health kick. The [Dancing With The Stars co-host ](https://thenerdstash.com/former-dwts-pro-julianne-hough-talks-wellness-in-her-birthday-suit/)looked incredible as she showed off one of her workout sessions in a skimpy pink legging outfit that showcased her dancer’s body perfectly. Hough partnered with Blender Bites and hit up their [Instagram ](https://www.instagram.com/p/C1sOPiuMxw8/?hl=en)account to share a video of herself riding an exercise bike in a spirited fashion as she worked her toned muscles. In the video, Hough is rocking a hot pink sports bra that fits tightly around her tiny torso and spotlights her toned arms and shoulders. Meanwhile, she added a pair of matching high-waisted leggings. The workout pants clung tightly to her toned legs as she bounced up and down while riding the stationary bike. The actress put a little flair into her workout by swaying her hips and adding a dancing element to the routine. Julianne Hough Shows off Her Sexy Workout Routine Julianne Hough accessorized her workout look with a gold necklace and matching bracelet. She also wore a pair of bright white sneakers. She had her sandy blonde hair parted down the middle. The locks were styled in loose waves that poured over her shoulders and down her back as she moved her body rhythmically. Of course, fans didn’t hesitate to share their thoughts on Hough’s steamy workout video. “My whole queen,” one person commented. Another fan posted a flame, heart eyes, and shocked face emoji to show their reaction to the clip. It appears that the dancer has big plans for the upcoming year. She recently shared her intentions to her own Instagram account, disclosing that she’s ready for big moments as she lives in gratitude, per [The Sun.](https://www.the-sun.com/entertainment/10020453/julianne-hough-exercises-leggings-bra-after-dwts/) Meanwhile, Julianne Hough continues to inspire her fans regarding [ her fitness and wellness routines](https://thenerdstash.com/former-dwts-pro-julianne-hough-talks-wellness-in-her-birthday-suit/), as well as her fashion choices. So, taking her advice when it comes to exercise is something that her followers are likely to do.
